ygData.subject: lindel
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, lets get on veeshan, find Lindel and find out more. You said this was a long time ago, maybe he has changed his POV and will tell us now. Maybe if he knows
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, lets get on veeshan, find Lindel and find out more. You said this was a
long time ago, maybe he has changed his POV and will tell us now. Maybe if
he knows that we NEED this secret, he will tell us... he is on your friends
list, tell him ill pay him! 1000pp if he tells me! my god, i need to know
NOW!! ahhhh..well, 1000pp if the formula works.. but you said you thought he
was telling the truth, ill give 1000pp before it works (if he sounds
trustworthy) maybe 1000pp is too steep.. thats all i have kinda.. maybe a
few 100 is a better deal.. Lindel is the correct spelling? ill start on
veeshan today and find that monk. you said he didn't come on very much. this
might mean he has a other character (most likely a gnome) that he plays more
often. lets try to find its name. For now, I think Lindel the monk is my
best bet so im gonna pester him till he tells me.. or maybe not.. ill be
nice and start to cry.. Ill tell anyone if I find anything more out. if not,
i wont post repeated info. Off to veeshan I go
